pr_title: OC-595 Log information about messages on Kafka topics

timeline.message:
OC-595 ~ Adds logging of Kafka consumer records

Adds KafkaLogger for use with consumer configuration on Kafka topics to
be able to log data and metadata of messages that are posted on a topic.

Adds osgp-adapter-kafka-logging as deployable project in servlet
containers with configuration of consumers for currently known topics
in the GXF code base.

The configurations of the different logging consumers are subject to a
Spring conditional, following a boolean property (for instance
peakshaving.kafka.logging.enabled). Default this enabled property is set
to false, which should prevent warning or error logging if a Kafka
broker is not available for certain topics in a monitored environment.

The consumed messages for the configured topics will be logged to a file
specified in the logback configuration with an appender named MESSAGES.
This appender leaves out most of the default stuff that is normally
added as context with logged data, leaving only the date and time of
logging, and the message that is logged.

timeline.author: robindenadel

timeline.message:
OC-595 ~ Removed DistributionAutomation MeterReading logging

The MeterReadings are a left-over from a hackathon that has taken place.

The Avro format mentioned in the story acceptance criteria is one that
still has to be defined as an outcome of OC-574. Once that is done, the
peak shaving consumer tests that work with a String based consumer
record value, will have to be updated to use the new Avro format.

OC-595 ~ Removes dependency to meter reading Avro project

The code for logging meter readings messages has been removed from the
osgp-adapter-kafka-logging project. This removes the no longer
applicable maven dependency as well.
